com.example.atheneum.models

Class SingletonRequestQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.atheneum.models.SingletonRequestQueue

  • public class SingletonRequestQueue
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton for app wide RequestQueue for API calls Taken from https://developer.android.com/training/volley/requestqueue

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SingletonRequestQueue getInstance(android.content.Context context)
        Get the instance of the singleton
        Parameters:
        context - context where the singleton is invoked. Realistically only needed once to get the application context
        Returns:
        the existing instance of SingletoneRequestQueue, or a new one if none existed

      • getRequestQueue

        public com.android.volley.RequestQueue getRequestQueue()
        Initialize a singleton object of RequestQueue type within the singleton. This is for allowing expantion of the class to potentially hold other data as well. Currently, this is not necessarily needed and could be included in the SingletonRequestQueue constructor. Used when accessing the request queue.
        Returns:
        the RequestQueue instance

      • addToRequestQueue

        public <T> void addToRequestQueue(com.android.volley.Request<T> req)
        Add a request to the requestQueue
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type parameter for the request object
        Parameters:
        req - the request object
